course_main_structural_unit.address:
L. Puusepa 8
50406 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: During the class the students explore basic concepts of laboratory medicine and possibilities to use most frequent lab investigations. They perform practical exercises by microscopy of the blood and urine sediment specimens, by interpreting changes in glucose metabolism. They practice how to couple laboratory results with other clinical indicators of the status of the ill and healthy individual. The class is a part of the course of Fundamentals of  the diagnostics.
description.et: Tsükli vältel õpitakse tundma laboratoorse meditsiini põhimõisteid ja sagedasemate laboratoorsete uuringute kasutusvõimalusi. Tehakse praktilisi töid vere- ja uriini preparaate mikroskopeerides, glükoosi ainevahetuse interpreteerimisel. Harjutatakse laboratoorsete tulemuste seostamist teiste haige ja terve inimese seisundi kliiniliste näitajatega. Tegemist on ühe osaga diagnostika aluste kursusest.

objectives.en: To obtain basic concepts of laboratory medicine (terms, critical evaluation of the results of the lab investigations), pracical treatment of the most frequent hematological and biochemical tests.
objectives.et: Omandada laboratoorse meditsiini põhimõisted (terminoloogia,  uuringute tulemuste kriitiline hindamine), sagedasemate hematoloogiliste ja biokeemiliste testide praktiline käsitlus.

learning_outcomes.en: The students who have successfully passed the class
1.	know the basic concepts of laboratory medicine,
2.	can instruct a patient before the lab tests in order to minimize the effect of preanalytical factors to the results,
learning_outcomes.et: 2.	oskavad haiget instrueerida labori uuringute eel, et minimeerida preanalüütiliste tegurite mõju tulemustele,

learning_outcomes.en: 3.	are able to interprete major deviations in most frequent hematological investigations,
learning_outcomes.et: 3.	oskavad tõlgendada suuremaid kõrvalekaldeid sagedasemates hematoloogilistes uuringutes,

learning_outcomes.en: 4.	are able to assay the level of glucose in blood and comment the results,
learning_outcomes.et: 4.	oskavad määrata glükoosi taset veres ja tulemusi tõlgendada,

learning_outcomes.en: 5.	know critical values of the vital laboratory parameters,
learning_outcomes.et: 5.	teavad elutähtsate laboratoorsete parameetrite kriitilisi väärtusi,

learning_outcomes.en: 6.	can make decisions on reference change values, taking into consideration biological variantion of the corresponding analyte.
learning_outcomes.et: 6.	oskavad teha otsuseid laboratoorsete näitajate muutuse olulisuse kohta, arvesse võttes analüüdi bioloogilist varieeruvust.

notes.et: Seminari eel tuleb läbida positiivse tulemusega seminari eelsed testid (antud seminari teemal). Test tuleb sooritada enne seminari/praktikumi algust ja selle tegemata jätmisel ei pääse seminaris/praktikumis osalema. Kõigis seminarides ja praktikumidest osavõtt on kohustuslik. Puudutud seminarid/praktikumid tuleb järele teha mõne muu grupiga. Seminarides ja praktikumides on kohustuslik kanda kitlit ja vahetusjalatseid.

grade_preconditions.et: Osalemine seminarides ja praktikumides, lävendi ületamine seminari eelsetes testides Moodlis

description.et: Introduction. Ordering and collecting samples. Abbreviations and units. Reference limits: Concept and practice. Decision limits.

Selection of  the best test: Sensitivity, specificity and predictive value of the test. 
Interpretation of the laboratory results 1: Least  significant change, incl.  analytical variation. 
2. Risk assessment based on a laboratory result (forecasting).
.
Urine analysis. Laboratory evaluation of renal function.
Hematological analysis I. phlebotomy for sample collection. Hematologic analyzer and the common parameters. Faecal investigations.
Hematological analysis II. Laboratory assessment of blood smear. Leukocyte diff. count, and typical shifts. Laboratory parameters of inflammation.
Laboratory investigations in case of diabetes. Changes in water and electrolyte balance (DCA example).

Medically significant change in laboratory test results (using the own results of the determination of glucose assays). STAT tests.
Quiz.
